content: this is a quick and easy bag to make it s perfect for your small take-along projects the bag is 7 inches 17 8cm high and the square bottom is 5 inches x 5 inches 12 7cm square to close the bag simply push the longer strap through the loop made by the shorter strap it can then be worn on your wrist gauge is not really important however you will see that i used a smaller hook size in order to create a dense fabric for the bag watch for an upcoming link to my friend s knitted version 1 of the same bag she is knitknotes23 and her lovely bag has approximately the same dimensions and is made with the same yarn stitches used--chain single_crochet double_crochet triple crochet slip_stitch please send me a message if you have any questions about this pattern 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/japanese-knot-project-bag-2
